title: How can we know the WiMAX Stick is detected by PC, what can I do if this happens
answer:
(1)Right click "My Computer", select "Manage" and then select "Device Manager", if there is a new CD ROM (the name of CD ROM may be different according to customization) and a new Mass Storage Device generated after plugging, then we can recognize that WiMAX Stick is detected by PC
(2)If this happens, we can double click the CD ROM in "My Computer" to run the program
